text: int min ( int size , int arr [ ] ) { int min = arr [ 0 ] , i ; for ( i = 1 ; i < size ; i ++ ) { if ( arr [ i ] < min ) min = arr [ i ] ; } return ( min ) ; } int main ( ) { int T , i , j , N ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < T ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; int array [ N ] ; for ( j = 0 ; j < N ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & array [ j ] ) ; printf ( "%lld\n" , ( N - 1 ) * min ( N , array ) ) ; } }
